backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing visitor messages in a list with functions to submit and retrieve all messages.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that defines message and actor types and returns the existing actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report listing features, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for deployment‑related fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping summarizing the purpose of all major frontend components, hooks, and sections.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_AUDIT_NOTES.md: Notes outlining required Vite build behavior, IC asset‑serving rules, and checks to ensure no /src/* file requests in production.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint with metadata, fonts, favicon, and root div; relies on Vite to inject scripts during build.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all sections with dark theme enforcement and smooth scrolling.
Wrapper component adding fade/slide‑in animations using IntersectionObserver with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/Figure.tsx: Simple figure component rendering an image with optional caption and styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer containing about text, quick links, social icons, and dynamic year handling.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCards.tsx: Component rendering styled quote cards with decorative elements and optional authors.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: A contact form with validation and submission via a custom hook, showing success and error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/Documen: A content-heavy section presenting biographical and narrative text with quotes about Hazrat Sakhi Habib Sultan Nangiana.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: A gallery displaying shrine-related images with an animated grid and a lightbox for viewing and navigating photos.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: A hero banner with a blurred background image, title text, and a button that scrolls to the documentary section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reflect: A styled section displaying a spiritual reflection story with decorative elements and text about patience and faith.
frontend/src/components/sections/ShrineL: Renders a shrine description and animated counters highlighting legacy metrics using IntersectionObserver-driven animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Storyte: A storytelling card explaining the origin of the Nangiana name with styled text, quotes, and visual embellishments.
frontend/src/components/sections/Timelin: Displays a four‑item spiritual timeline with icons and animated section entries using a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/SpiritualModeTog: A toggle button that controls a looping ambient audio track using session state, handling mute and autoplay behavior.
frontend/src/components/StickyNav.tsx: A fixed navigation bar with scroll-based progress, active section highlighting, mobile menu support, and a spiritual mode toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Tracks and returns the currently visible section ID using an IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUpOnView.ts: Provides a hook that animates counting up to a target number when an element enters view, with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and auth‑client setup and state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Returns whether the user prefers reduced motion by listening to the relevant media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: A React hook that tracks scroll position and returns page scroll progress as a percentage with event listeners for scroll and resize.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: A React hook that syncs a state value with sessionStorage, initializing from storage and persisting updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitVisitorMessa: A React Query mutation hook that submits a visitor message via an actor, shows toast notifications, and refreshes the messages query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining an emerald–gold design system, dark mode variables, and custom components like glass cards and documentary typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with InternetIdentity and React Query providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and design tokens using CSS variables for the theme.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration with React plugin, environment variable injection, path aliasing, build output settings, and a dev server proxy.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, architecture, known issues, and existing implemented features for the documentary website.
